name: Pledgerunner
tag_list: charity, fundraiser, crowdfunding, mobile, wearable-devices, smartphone, walkathon, support, rewards, points
overview:
Pledgerunner is your personal walkathon app, designed to support any fundraiser while you walk, jog, hike or bike with your mobile or wearable device.

Pledgerunner is a platform designed to extend the reach of small to medium sized charity fundraisers that need a broader audience.

To support the process of donor activity, Pledgerunner provides three different ways a charity can generate fundraising, without impacting any traditional platforms a charity may use. Donors can pledge support for a charity by completing an activity, like running, walking, jogging or biking. Donors can sponsor others who have pledged support for a charity. Donors can also provide incentives for the charity fundraiser, to help motivate others who have pledged support for a charity.
